commits.author: Tomoko Uchida
commits.sourceNew:
/** * Reloads the factory list from the given {@link ClassLoader}. * Changes to the factories are visible after the method ends, all * iterators ({@link #availableCharFilters()},...) stay consistent. * *

NOTE: Only new factories are added, existing ones are * never removed or replaced. * *

This method is expensive and should only be called for discovery * of new factories on the given classpath/classloader! */ public static void reloadCharFilters(ClassLoader classloader) { loader.reload(classloader); }
commits.sourceOld:
/** * Reloads the factory list from the given {@link ClassLoader}. * Changes to the factories are visible after the method ends, all * iterators ({@link #availableCharFilters()},...) stay consistent. * *

NOTE: Only new factories are added, existing ones are * never removed or replaced. * *

This method is expensive and should only be called for discovery * of new factories on the given classpath/classloader! */ public static void reloadCharFilters(ClassLoader classloader) { loader.reload(classloader); }
